JobTitle: Sales Rep - Team Lead - Data Solutions
JobFullDesc:
Department 

The Data Solutions division is the commercial data business of Moody’s Analytics, bringing together a vast catalogue of data to help business decision-makers assess risks and opportunities. We are best known for Orbis, the world’s most comprehensive database of public and private companies. We are also the definitive source of ratings-related data for companies and securities that have been rated by Moody’s Investors Service. We strive to deliver convenience and insight to our customers by eliminating the hassle of sourcing, preparing and accessing data, adding value when decisions need to be made. Any analytical activity depends on reliable and accessible data, and we are proud to be a mission-critical information resource for decision-makers around the world. Job Description

			At Cortera, a Moody's Analytics company, we’re on a mission to become the world’s best source for private company information, while being innovative in the way that we do it. We’re passionate about business information and have the largest credit database with richer more accurate data that comes from tens of thousands of businesses in our community.This role is responsible for driving the sales process for a narrow set of products or services.  Key activities include working with the sales team to ensure adequate performance and metrics, ensure daily, weekly and monthly activity is generating the necessary sales results,  assist in completing the sales cycle to closure.  Additionally, the role requires the assessment of team needs and providing team with specific guidance and performance overviews. The Team Lead also has responsibility for providing support to the sales reps by regularly coaching, training and providing feedback.Responsibilities:Team Lead:Oversee the day-today- activities for the Pulse inside sales team.Provide expert support to sales reps by acting as a key point of contact for day-to-day issues and questions. Ensure key processes and procedures are adhered to; providing seamless service delivery to all clients that interact with Account Management and improve operational effectiveness.Identify knowledge gaps within the team.
